sect3.title: Configuration Information
sect3.para: As with most libraries, there is no configuration to do, save that the library directory /opt/qt/lib should appear in /etc/ld.so.conf so that ldd can find the shared libraries. The following command will add it if it is missing:

screen.userinput:
cat >> /etc/ld.so.conf << "EOF" # Begin qt addition to /etc/ld.so.conf
/opt/qt/lib
# End qt addition EOF ldconfig

sect3.para: You need to add the path for the Qt man pages to the man.conf file. This can be done with the following command:

screen.userinput:
cat >> /etc/man.conf << "EOF" # Begin qt addition to man.conf
MANPATH /opt/qt/doc/man
# End qt addition to man.conf EOF
